games.name: Achiga vs Shiraitodai - National Finals
games.description: From the anime 'Saki', this legendary match features incredible tile draws and strategic play. Achiga's Saki demonstrates her supernatural ability to draw winning tiles, while Shiraitodai's Teru shows perfect defensive play. The match showcases advanced riichi declarations and dora strategies.
highlights: Multiple riichi declarations in one hand

games.name: Akagi vs Washizu - The Final Battle
games.description: From the manga/anime 'Akagi', this is one of the most intense mahjong matches ever depicted. Akagi, a 13-year-old prodigy, faces off against the yakuza boss Washizu in a high-stakes game. The match features psychological warfare, perfect tile reading, and incredible bluffs.

games.name: World Mahjong Championship 2017 Final
games.description: The final match of the 2017 World Mahjong Championship featured players from China, Japan, Europe, and America. The game showcased different playing styles and strategies from around the world, with incredible comebacks and strategic play.

games.name: Tenhou Legendary Match - Perfect Hand
games.description: A legendary online match where a player achieved a perfect hand (Kokushi Musou - Thirteen Orphans) after declaring riichi. This is one of the rarest and highest-scoring hands in mahjong, with odds of approximately 1 in 33,000.

games.name: Classical Chinese Mahjong - Master's Game
games.description: A classic example of traditional Chinese mahjong play, featuring complex scoring, special hands, and traditional strategies. This game demonstrates the depth and beauty of classical Chinese mahjong rules.
